description: I developed an e-commerce project as my final project for a university BootCamp. We incorporates features such as user authentication, secure payment processing, and a responsive design.
I developed a project that consumes the JoJo's API to create detailed information views for each character and a search feature to find specific characters.
The project involved utilizing the Mercado Libre API to create a comprehensive application wit all subcategories, providing a detailed and organized structure for the various product categories.
technology: React, Pure CSS, Mercado Libre API
